subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Joe Maddon was named was the A.L. winner and Kirk Gibson won the N.L. honor, but more intriguing, perhaps, was the news that Terry Francona did not expect to manage next year.
snippet: Joe Maddon was named was the A.L. winner and Kirk Gibson won the N.L. honor, but more intriguing, perhaps, was the news that Terry Francona did not expect to manage next year.
